meanings.definition: A person who enlists in the military or other organization.
meanings.sent1: The enlisters signed up to serve their country.
meanings.sent2: The enlisters joined the army to protect their nation.
meanings.sent3: The enlisters joked about their matching uniforms.
meanings.sent4: The enlisters were the backbone of the military.
meanings.sent5: The enlisters stood proudly in their uniforms.

meanings.definition: Those who recruit or persuade others to join a cause or organization.
meanings.sent1: The enlisters convinced many to support the charity.
meanings.sent2: The enlisters brought new members to the team.
meanings.sent3: The enlisters playfully competed to recruit the most.
meanings.sent4: The enlisters were like magnets, drawing in new members.
